name: AlertLayerTweaks
description: Modifies FLAlertLayers as you please; mostly to fit more text onto the screen. Useful for mods with long descriptions for their settings.

modsLayer.name: Only in Geode Mod Index
modsLayer.description: Only tweak <cy>most</c> Alert Layers when viewing the Geode mod index, or descriptions of settings from Geode mods.

flAlertWidthMultiplier.name: Width Multiplier
flAlertWidthMultiplier.description:
Multiplies the width of <cy>most</c> Alert Layers
(such as this one you're viewing).

Don't worry, the mod will cap all widths to <cg>420</c> units.

<cy>Enabling the "Text Scroll" setting will override whatever value you've set here.</c>

textScale.name: Text Scale
textScale.description:
Changes the text scale of <cy>most</c> Alert Layers
(such as this one you're viewing).

<cy>Enabling the "Text Scroll" setting will override whatever value you've set here. Text scales are also ignored in alerts with scrolling enabled.</c>

textScroll.name: Text Scroll
textScroll.description:
Enable (with 1), ignore (with 0), or disable (with -1) text scrolling in <cy>most</c> Alert Layers
(such as this one you're viewing).

<cy>Note that enabling text scroll will override your "Width Multiplier" and "Text Scale" settings.</c>

bouncingTransition.name: Bouncing Transition
bouncingTransition.description:
Enable (with 1), ignore (with 0), or disable (with -1) the bouncing transition when opening <cy>most</c> Alert Layers.

<cy>This setting is ignored if you have "Fast Menu" from in-game settings enabled.</c>

logging.name: Enable Logging
logging.description: Logs the properties of <cy>most</c> Alert Layers, in case something goes wrong.
